headline: Rear Admiral Oguntuga Honored in Ijebu-Ife
excerpt: Ijebu-Ife celebrates Rear Admiral Kolawole Oguntuga for his Nigerian Navy service, with Governor Dapo Abiodun and Oba Oguntayo leading the festivities.

thumbnail.description: Rear Admiral Oguntuga with dignitaries at the Ajalorun Palace during the celebration.

headline: Agemo Festival Unites Ijebu-Ife Community
excerpt: Ijebu-Ife joins Ijebuland in the vibrant Agemo Festival, with priests performing rituals to honor the deity and pray for prosperity.

thumbnail.description: Colorfully dressed Agemo priests during the festival rituals in Ijebuland.

headline: Tefa Initiation Revives Spiritual Heritage
excerpt: Women in Ijebu-Ife participate in the Tefa Ifa initiation, a sacred Yoruba ritual preserving the townâ€™s spiritual traditions.

thumbnail.description: Women in white attire at the Tefa initiation ceremony near Ijebu-Ife.

headline: Oba Oguntayo Launches Scholarship Program
excerpt: Oba Adesesan Oguntayo awards scholarships to Ijebu-Ife students, boosting education and empowering the next generation.

thumbnail.description: Oba Oguntayo presenting scholarship certificates at a community event.

headline: Ijebu-Ife Hosts Interfaith Peace Festival
excerpt: Christians, Muslims, and traditionalists unite at the Ajalorun Palace for a festival promoting peace and harmony in Ijebu-Ife.

thumbnail.description: Diverse religious groups at the Ijebu-Ife palace during the interfaith festival.

headline: Community Health Outreach Saves Lives
excerpt: Ijebu-Ife General Hospital hosts a free health outreach, offering eye tests and medical care, supported by Oba Oguntayo.

thumbnail.description: Residents receiving medical care at Ijebu-Ife General Hospital.
